segment.source: Advanced security audit policy settings are found in Security SettingsAdvanced Audit Policy ConfigurationSystem Audit Policies and appear to overlap with basic security audit policies, but they are recorded and applied differently.
segment.target: Advanced security audit policy settings are found in Security SettingsAdvanced Audit Policy ConfigurationSystem Audit Policies and appear to overlap with basic security audit policies, but they are recorded and applied differently.

segment.source: Advanced security audit policy settings are found in Security SettingsAdvanced Audit Policy ConfigurationSystem Audit Policies and appear to overlap with basic security audit policies, but they are recorded and applied differently.
segment.target: Advanced security audit policy settings are found in Security SettingsAdvanced Audit Policy ConfigurationSystem Audit Policies and appear to overlap with basic security audit policies, but they are recorded and applied differently.

segment.source: When you apply basic audit policy settings to the local computer by using the Local Security Policy snap-in, you are editing the effective audit policy, so changes made to basic audit policy settings will appear exactly as configured in Auditpol.exe.
segment.target: When you apply basic audit policy settings to the local computer by using the Local Security Policy snap-in, you are editing the effective audit policy, so changes made to basic audit policy settings will appear exactly as configured in Auditpol.exe.

segment.source: In Windows 7 and later, advanced security audit policies can be controlled by using Group Policy.
segment.target: In Windows 7 and later, advanced security audit policies can be controlled by using Group Policy.

segment.source: Planning and deploying advanced security audit policies
segment.target: Planning and deploying advanced security audit policies

segment.source: This topic for the IT professional explains the options that security policy planners must consider and the tasks they must complete to deploy an effective security audit policy in a network that includes advanced security audit policies
segment.target: This topic for the IT professional explains the options that security policy planners must consider and the tasks they must complete to deploy an effective security audit policy in a network that includes advanced security audit policies

segment.source: This topic for the IT professional lists questions and answers about understanding, deploying, and managing security audit policies.
segment.target: This topic for the IT professional lists questions and answers about understanding, deploying, and managing security audit policies.

segment.source: Using advanced security auditing options to monitor dynamic access control objects
segment.target: Using advanced security auditing options to monitor dynamic access control objects

segment.source: This guide explains the process of setting up advanced security auditing capabilities that are made possible through settings and events that were introduced in Windows 8 and Windows Server 2012.
segment.target: This guide explains the process of setting up advanced security auditing capabilities that are made possible through settings and events that were introduced in Windows 8 and Windows Server 2012.

segment.source: This reference for IT professionals provides information about the advanced audit policy settings that are available in Windows and the audit events that they generate.
segment.target: This reference for IT professionals provides information about the advanced audit policy settings that are available in Windows and the audit events that they generate.
